name: Enceladus (itch) (Rakanishu)
description:
This map is available for Serious Sam: The Second Encounter and Serious Sam Classics: Revolution.

Author: Rakanishu 
Credits: DMI-1407 (skybox), Nifran Tay (textures)
Creation date: 29 November 2014
Latest Version: 23 May 2021 (Version 2)

Changelog

Version 2 - (23 May 2021)
* Changed position and color in level list.
* High Quality Thumbnail

Features:

- Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch map which takes place in an orbital station orbiting around Enceladus
- Shotguns and Rocket launchers are the only weapons in that map
- Totally new ambiance using DMI-1407's Skybox!
- Space style level using Xaviers' (Warped Mod) and Nifran Tay's textures

Note : The map hasn't been updated to Serious Sam: Revolution.
